welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bengkulu, Indonesia! Get ready to experience the city's rich history, beautiful beaches, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Bengkulu has to offer.

restaurants.address: Jl. Pariwisata Pantai Berkas, Bengkulu, Propinsi Bengkulu
